metadata.title: CVE-2023-0129 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Network Service in Google Chrome prior to109.0.5414.74 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via a craftedHTML page and specific interactions. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
